author: chfast
content: What are the valid values for ⁨`y_parity`⁩ in 7702 signatures? <@543900561460822016>

author: lightclient
content: i think it's just 0 or1 1? i don't think anything is accepted by ecrecover

author: lightclient
content: i mean the actual crypto operation ecrecover, not the evm variant

author: lightclient
content: i'm pretty sure they only accept 0 and 1 for the recovery id

author: chfast
content: Ok, but nothing says what it is.

author: _shemnon
content: For the whole protocol y_parity is a mixed bag. From my experience working with it if the spec was deployed pre-access lists (EIP-2930) then it is 27/28, otherwise it is 0/1.  So all the newer typed transactions and 7702 auth is 0/1 but the precompile is still 0x1b / 0x1c
